Title: Prohibits the sale and distribution of mercury-added lamps; repealer
Summary: Prohibits the sale and distribution of mercury-added lamps on and after January 1, 2026.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-2107, rpld ยง27-2107 sub 11, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale and distribution of mercury-added lamps; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
